metadata.title: CVE-2021-31799 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In RDoc 3.11 through 6.x before 6.3.1, as distributed with Ruby through3.0.1, it is possible to execute arbitrary code via | and tags in afilename.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.10
ruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu1.10').
